text: hey Sebastien, we've also got Sprocket Talk on FB - <https://www.facebook.com/groups/sprockettalk/>
Hi there, i have a default blog layout that, for some reason does not show the featured image, i have ticked the button for it and i have chosen an image...does anyone know why that might be?
You clicked the button in the Blog Settings? Are you certain that the code for the featured image is in your blog template?
hi Reg, no i did not know that! thanks a lot!

I’ve just run into this my self today.
I didn’t bother doing this because it’s slightly long but I think you can use the forms API creating your own html form then submit it with ajax to HubSpot

Is there really no way to overwrite a prior property with a blank in a form? Our particular use case is an address update form, with which contacts will often move from a place with an "Address2" field like "Suite 200" to a place without an "Address2"
<https://integrate.HubSpot.com/t/not-able-to-set-property-to-blank/8924>
Good day people!  I just got invited here and wanted to ask guidance. Where do I ask for help related to modules not appearing in the template/web page designer?

Hi,
Just want to know if there's a way to determine the page/link where the customer feeback is being submitted?
We really need to determine these pages so we can make improvements from there (for those who have negative feedback on specific page(s)).
